title: Charles Quaid
text:
Charles Edward Quaid (17 August 1908 – 18 December 1984) was a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. A <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Hooker">hooker</a>, Quaid represented , , and at a provincial level. He was a member of the New Zealand national side, the <a href="All%20Blacks">All Blacks</a>, on their <a href="1938%20New%20Zealand%20rugby%20union%20tour%20of%20Australia">1938 tour of Australia</a> on which he played four matches, including two internationals.
Quaid died at <a href="Upper%20Hutt">Upper Hutt</a> on 18 December 1984, and was buried at Akatarawa Cemetery.
